label: 地頭
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Warrior overseer appointed by the Kamakura bakufu to collect shōen taxes and supervise local police duties. The most important local figure during the Kamakura period, the jitō lost his importance in the Muromachi period.　(See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu)　[荘園]
